data.name: Freeway Fiasco
data.detailed_description:
Freeway Fiasco is a time-bending puzzle game. The player must use the mysterious power of causality to affect traffic flow and prevent as many jams, deaths and humanoid-or-not explosions to save your soul from damnation.

Play through multiple levels of purgatory featuring different mechanics, unique areas and curious morality, as well as an original soundtrack to keep you company, in case you get lonely down there.

Key features:

  • Puzzles
    In each level of purgatory, you'll discover new ways of controlling time.
    These include the ability to rewind, objects that are immune to being rewound, time that is tied to space, and more.
    On the road, you also have to follow the rules. Navigate traffic lights, exploit potholes, obey stop streets, blast through speed boosts, use power-ups and more.
  • Story
    You have sinned. Your atonement is now in the hands of the mysterious Adjudicator.
    Through narration, explore the mystery of your existence in purgatory, and find a way to get out before you're sent to a place far worse.
  • Original Music Score

data.short_description: Freeway Fiasco is a time-bending puzzle game. Control multiple cars, one at a time in a shared timeline. Your choices can set off a ripple effect with surprising interactions - past, present and future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1gb VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yosemite 10.10.5 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1gb VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
